TLINE.TDLINE: &DESCRIPTION&
The purpose of this program is to create Capital Expenditure Report.
For the same input, there are two forms of report available:
generic: report is sorted by Project Type, Proirity and WBS elements
by division: report is sorted by division, and then within division by
Project Type, Proirity and WBS elements.
Input
Selection screen has four parts: General Information,
Additions/Replacements, Retirements/Abandoments/Proceeds/Salvage and
Form of Report.
In the General Information part, user can accept/change Company Code
(defaulted to 'UGL'), Fiscal Year (default set to current year, however
user can enter a different year), Plan Version (defaulted to '0'),
comperative Plan Version (defaulted to '0') and division (this entry is
only important where 'By Division' form of report is selected. If
'Generic' form is selected, Division field does not have any bearing on
the selection criteria).
The entry for next two parts of the report are handled through the
VARIANT 'Real Data'. For ever line visible on the entry sceen, this
variant contains corresponding numbers of WBS elements.
Form of Report. At the time, only one form of report can be selected:
Generic or By Division. In order to run the report, user must select
one and only one option.
&OUTPUT&
Generic Form of Report.
The output is divided into two parts: Additions/Replacements and
Retirements/Abandoments/Proceeds/Salvage. Within these parts,
information is sorted by Project Type, Project Priority and WBS
element.
For each WBS element followinfg is displayed:
WBS element
description of WBS element
year-to-date approved plan
year-to-date actual costs
difference between actual cost and approved plan
total budget
approved budget
unapproved budget
total plan by selected version plan
total plan by selected copmerative version plan.
Report also shows totals by priority, project type and totals for the
report.
By Division.
The output is divided into two parts: Additions/Replacements and
Retirements/Abandoments/Proceeds/Salvage. Within these parts,
information is sorted by Division, Project Type, Priority and WBS
elements.
Columns arrangements is identical as for Gereric Form of Report. Totals
are shown by priority, project type, division, and report.
